original_title: Bob the Builder On Site: Roads & Bridges
overview: Join Bob and his Can-Do Crew as they explore real life construction sites. See diggers, mixers and trucks work together to build roads and bridges. From the first foundations and at every step along the way, Bob the Builderâ„¢ and some fun new friends show you the exciting world of big machines.
tagline: For the first time ever, Bob is going on site!
title: Bob the Builder On Site: Roads & Bridges
